alert.note: Alert for Boyd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:29PM EDT until August 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BOYD AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENUP COUNTIES... At 228 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Naples, or near Cannonsburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Cannonsburg around 235 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Flatwoods, Raceland, and Russell. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
